metadata.title: CVE-2018-15672 hdf5: Divide-by-zero in the function H5D__chunk_init() resulting in a denial of service (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2018-11207. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2018-11207. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2018-11207 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
hdf5 is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
